ComicInfo.Summary: Gunther kills Noble for being a spy for the Covenant of the Sword and takes over Project Born Again. The mysterious soldier known as Bloodstrike is sent to a Covenant stronghold where a senator and his daughter are being held against their will. Bloodstrike makes it to the senator but guns him down for being a spy for the Brotherhood of Man.
ComicInfo.Title: Born Again
ComicInfo.Writer: Robert Place Napton,Rob Liefeld,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton,Rob Liefeld,Karl Altstaetter,Robert Napton
